alert.note: Alert for Scott (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 24 at 8:36PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Rock Island, northwestern Henry and southeastern Scott Counties through 915 PM CDT... At 836 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Moline, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could break small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Davenport, Moline, Rock Island, Bettendorf, East Moline, Silvis, Colona, Milan, Le Claire, Coal Valley, Hampton, Orion, Port Byron, Rapids City, Princeton, Cordova, Riverdale, Oak Grove, Cleveland, and Warner. This includes the following highways... Interstate 74 in Iowa between mile markers 1 and 5. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 299 and 306. Interstate 80 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 15. Interstate 74 in Illinois between mile markers 1 and 20. Interstate 88 between mile markers 1 and 4. Interstate 280 between mile markers 13 and 18. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
